A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: While not the Star Wars movie or feel nor the story we are used to. The Star Wars feels hurried\, poorly written and all for the sake of plot advancement . More of a feeling of SuckerPunch 2- very little to no good linear easy to follow story with no twists or cool scenes. Mostly all action scenes or horribly designed technical flaws\, such as a character being struck by a torpedo and then surviving the vacuum of space.\nA very high let down.
